    • Uses of Item in gameworld.entity

      Subclasses of Item in gameworld.entity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Armour
      Armour can be equipped by a player can will reduce the amount of damage the player takes from an attack according to the armour type
      class  Gold
      Gold is used to represent the players score.
      class  Key
      This class represents a key that can be used to unlock a container or an EntranceTile
      class  Potion
      A potion can be used by a player to regain some of the players missing health
      class  Weapon
      A weapon can be equipped by a player so that when a player attacks another player the attacking player will deal the amount of damage associated with the weapon type

    • Uses of Item in network

      Fields in network declared as Item 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Item NetworkEvent.item 
      Methods in network that return Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Item NetworkEvent.getItem() 
      Methods in network with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Client.addItem(Item item)
      Creates a NetworkEvent storing an item and writes it, tells the server to add this item to this players inventory.
      void Client.addItemContainer(Item item, Container container)
      Creates a NetworkEvent storing an item and a container and writes it, telling the server to add the item to the container.
      void Client.setArmour(Item item)
      Creates a NetworkEvent Storing an armour item and writes it, tells the server to equip this item on the player.
      void Client.setWeapon(Item item)
      Creates a NetworkEvent Storing a weapon item and writes it, tells the server to equip this item on the player.
      void Client.useItem(Item item)
      Creates a NetworkEvent storing an item and writes it, telling the server to use the item on this player.
      Constructors in network with parameters of type Item 
      Constructor and Description
      NetworkEvent(java.lang.String user, NetworkEvent.EventType type, Item item)
      User event, can be multiple types, gives an item.
      NetworkEvent(java.lang.String user, NetworkEvent.EventType type, Item item, Container container)
      User event of varying type, can be used for adding items to containers.
